Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kostner
ShortDescription: #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Ogden, Cicero, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kostner, Ogden, Cicero, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 26th/Kostner.
